Introduction
This topic contains information about evidentiary concepts, including
admissibility of evidence
definition of
credibility
competent evidence
, and
probative value
determining the probative value of evidence
definitions of positive and negative evidence
absence of evidence
, and
court holdings on
negative or absent evidence
, and
negative evidence and the duty to assist
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section A - Principles of Reviewing and Weighing Evidence
citation: Part V, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section A
